guest_info.name: Kurt Byers
guest_info.title: Head of Brokerage Partnerships
guest_info.production_level: Grown partnership deal revenue by 77% year over year

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents not knowing what to do with investor leads
problems_addressed.solution_summary: New Western's podium program allows agents to submit distressed properties for cash offers within 24 hours.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents losing potential revenue from distressed properties
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Agents can earn a 2% referral fee by referring properties to New Western.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Handling properties in poor condition that are hard to list
problems_addressed.solution_summary: New Western provides cash offers and manages the renovation process.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides a new revenue stream for agents who encounter properties they can't easily list.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Use New Western's program to monetize distressed properties and earn referral fees.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers a way to expand services and increase revenue by tapping into the investment market.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Leverage New Western's expertise to handle properties outside your comfort zone.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: We buy a house every 13 minutes. We want to buy more.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the scale and efficiency of New Western's operations.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Ever wondered how fast a real estate investment company can move?

clip_worthy_moments.quote: You don't have to become an expert in real estate investment. You just have to see a house that you want to sell that would be really hard to list.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Gives agents permission to leverage New Western without needing deep investment knowledge.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Not an investment expert? No problem!

key_tactics.tactic: Submit distressed properties to New Western for cash offers.
key_tactics.context: When encountering properties that are difficult to list or require extensive renovation.

key_tactics.tactic: Use demographic data to identify potential distressed properties.
key_tactics.context: Targeting older neighborhoods or areas with high turnover.

quotable_insights: Relationship building transcends industries, making real estate the perfect transition.
Our investors love taking bad houses and making them livable.

resources_mentioned.name: sell to newwestern.com
resources_mentioned.context: Platform for agents to submit properties and learn about the referral program.

episode_summary: In this episode, Kurt Byers from New Western discusses how real estate agents can leverage their podium program to submit distressed properties for cash offers, earning a 2% referral fee. The episode provides insights into identifying potential investment opportunities and expanding agent services without needing deep investment expertise.
